plot outline: Oruvar Meethu Iruvar Sainthu' is a love triangle about two women in love with the same man. This romance has been directed by Balasekaran of 'Love Today' fame and produced by N. K. Narayananarajhu. Karikalan has scripted the film and the cinematography has been handled by Vijayagopal while Hariharan is the film's music director. This love story stars Laguparan and Swathi in central roles while the rest of its ensemble cast comprises of Singampuli, Rajkapoor, Pandu, Chinni Jayanth, Paravai Muniamma and Harathi.
title: Oruvar Meethu Iruvar Sainthu
plot: _Oruvar Meethu Iruvar Sainthu_ (qv)' is a love triangle about two women in love with the same man. This romance has been directed by Balasekaran of 'Love Today' fame and produced by N. K. Narayananarajhu. Karikalan has scripted the film and the cinematography has been handled by Vijayagopal while Hariharan is the film's music director. This love story stars Laguparan and Swathi in central roles while the rest of its ensemble cast comprises of Singampuli, Rajkapoor, Pandu, Chinni Jayanth, Paravai Muniamma and Harathi.
